contexts.context: ...? Then, perhaps, your oath and service may <mark>please</mark> the Morag Tong.
...? Then, perhaps, your oath and service may <mark>please</mark> the Black Glove.
...? Then, perhaps, your oath and service may <mark>please</mark> .
...in agony, cried out to Sotha Sil: <mark>"Please</mark>, please, have mercy, little boy,...
..., cried out to Sotha Sil: "Please, <mark>please</mark>, have mercy, little boy, for what...
"Later, if you <mark>please</mark>," said the Ashkhan. "What happened then?"
..."If you are still in communication with Benitah, <mark>please</mark> give her my sympathies."
The council is <mark>pleased</mark> to report a reduction in the incidence of theft...
